title: Ph.D.
summary: Engineering lead specializing in real-time signal processing and data pipelines. I design and implement DSP algorithms with a focus on embedded systems, ensuring they perform reliably from prototype to production. I extract insights from complex and noisy sensor data. My technical background is full-stack, spanning embedded C development to cloud computing.

Built bespoke data pipeline framework for reproducible, version-controlled analysis across sensor iterations, with heterogeneous data sources and processing scripts
Exploration of ML approaches as alternative to traditional DSP algorithms. PyTorch/Lightning, cloud GPU infrastructure
